item.title: Waymo Leads On Cities, But Tesla Wins On Manufacturing Muscle, Ark Invest Says
item.description: Though Tesla may come second in a city after Waymo, the automaker has a key advantage in scaling the fleet, as per Keeney.

item.title: World’s Richest Person Elon Musk Sees Double-Digit US Growth Within 18 Months — Calls AI The Key Driver
item.description: The remarks were shared on X against a backdrop of strong U.S. growth data.

item.title: Hyundai Recalls Nearly 52,000 Towing-Suited Multipurpose Passenger Vehicles Over Potential Fire Risks
item.description: The recall includes model year 2022-2024 Tucson multipurpose passenger vehicles equipped with an optional Mobis tow hitch wiring harness.

item.title: Mondelez Misses Santa’s Nice List — Third 2025 Recall Strikes Baked Bites Brookies Before Christmas
item.description: The recall applies to select products distributed at a limited number of U.S. retail locations.

item.title: Biohaven Stock Slumps After Hours As Failed Depression Study Adds To A Brutal 2025 — Retail Eyes Epilepsy And Obesity Catalysts
item.description: The company said that no reduction in depressive symptoms were observed in the BHV-7000 trial over six weeks as compared with placebo.
